data.eml:eml: New cave-dwelling huntsman spider species of the genus Sinopoda (Araneae: Sparassidae) from southern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Liu, Jie, Li, Shuqiang, Jäger, Peter (2008): New cave-dwelling huntsman spider species of the genus Sinopoda (Araneae: Sparassidae) from southern China. Zootaxa 1857: 1-20, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.183582
